entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Self-hosted agent on M2 hangs when building MAUI on NET6 / NET7 / NET8 #95704
  • ReadOnlySpan<byte> SequenceEqual method seems to have regressed 25-30% between .Net 6 and .Net 8 #95703
  • HttpResponseMessage does not contain Content-Type and Content-Length headers in DelegatingHandler #95708
  • Enum.ToObject(typeof(MyEnum), 3.0) does not throw an ArgumentException #95697
  • [API Proposal]: `InvalidEnumArgumentException` should support `uint/long/ulong`-backed enumerations #95696
  • Convert all FCalls with HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls #95695
    Future
  • ASP.NET 7 restarts docker container with error traps: .NET ThreadPool general protection fault error:0 in libc-2.31.so #95694
  • Slightly suboptimal unrolled SequenceEqual codegen for ROS<byte> vs ROS<char> #95693
    Future
  • [iOS] `System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture` is not respected #95692
  • Thanks @Jericho for the feedback. Please re-open if this re-appears. #95691
  • SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated calls are expensive on Windows #95687
    Future
  • upgrade to .net 8.0 error CS8347, How to solve it? please. #95686
  • Generic type check allocates for nullable structs #95685
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Support of configuration options with a full qualified section key like in the old days of .NET Framework #95678
    Future
  • UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups() throws "Information about the domain could not be retrieved (1355)" #95676
  • Failing test `tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.cmd` on mono/osx #95669

Closed

  • en-de output format #95666
  • Missing Git tags for several 4.x releases #95198
  • `ZipArchive` in `Update` mode loads whole ZIP file into memory #94455
  • [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] VTable initialization failure for class implementing an interface #94490
    8.0.x
  • Mono's Vector128 support incorrectly handles Abs for signed integer MinValue #95592
    9.0.0
  • NetworkInformationException: Permission denied (.NET 8 + Docker +GCloud) #94794
    8.0.2
  • String interning broke with .NET 8? #95675
  • [browser] Running `Scenario=WasmTestOnNodeJS` does not set `ENVIRONMENT_IS_NODE` #95639
  • [WASM] Jiterpreter crash using `System.Text.JSON` and `WasmNativeStrip` usage. #94939
  • RequestReJIT crashes when called from CEEInfo::reportInliningDecision #95653
    9.0.0
  • Icorrect comment for the year pattern in DateTimeFormat #95629
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove dependency on AppDomain from a hello world app #95710
    needs-area-label
  • Fix comment typo in array.cpp #95709
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Added SVE_GK_2A and SVE_GL_1A arm64 encodings #95707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers. #95706
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: refactor CSE heuristics #95705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][mt] dynamic thread create #95702
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add Arm N2 SVE perfscore file #95700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NO-MERGE][WIP] Testing Swift interop CI lines #95699
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Reenable disabled nativeaot warnings and fix the issues #95698
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Generate interface lists for necessary EETypes #95683
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add post-phase validation of DFS tree #95682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update version of Microsoft.Diagnostics.Tracing.TraceEvent package #95680
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_EQ_3A to IF_SVE_HR_3A #95679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] LoongArch code sync #95673
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (4/N) #95670
    area-VM-coreclr
  • WIP 2 #95668
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP 1 #95667
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Added `SVE_GG_3A` to `SVG_GH_3A` ARM64 encodings #95665
    NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Error out if SelfContained is not specified for Native AOT publish #95496
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move most of the remaining Strong Name code to internal to the C++ file and remove duplicate validation #95536
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Provide System.ServiceModel.Syndication package readme #94638
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Threading.AccessControl package readme #94586
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][jit] Fix the bblock check in the box+callvirt optimization. #95500
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] Fix explicitly setting the return type on a dynamic method #95271
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-reflection-mono, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Catch exception when subscribing to NetworkChange #95123
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] [ios] Add optimized property to the Native AOT sample app #95640
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, os-ios, 8.0.2
  • [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] Fix explicitly setting the return type on a dynamic method #95183
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • arm: add the missing check for recentRefPosition #95671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reverse parsed mail adresses in a single action #95647
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement GetSortKey on hybrid mode #95260
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix call to RequestReJIT #95659
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Scalar.Abs for TInteger.MinValue #95597
    community-contribution, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Change several more arrays to be assembly data spans (w/ collection expressions) #93535
    area-System.Runtime
  • [wasm] Suppress export name minification #95613
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Fix DateTimeFormat comments for year pattern (#95629) #95650
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Bump WasmBuildTests timeout to 180min #95662
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.x

Updated

  • [JIT] Add BasicBlock::bbFlags helper methods #95139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Make isRemovableJmpCandidate less restrictive on AMD64 #95493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Move many interop tests to run in-proc and move many to built in the merged runner itself #94109
    test-enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Threading.RateLimiting package readme #94583
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: fix issue with out of order importer spilling around some calls #95587
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Avoid handing out duplicate `CORINFO_MODULE_STRUCT_*` handles #95499
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • Provide System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow package readme #94582
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Alpine test #95663
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make sure LOHThreshold less than region_size #95485
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Use full TLS record size for application data on Windows #95595
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static calls and handle nullable value types #94787
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debug URL in lauchSettings.json in wasmbrowser template #95418
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.2
  • JIT: Port VN and loop hoisting to new loop representation #95589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Update terminology in loop cloning, and simplify a bit #95648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [ILLink analyzer] Move generic parameter analysis to dataflow #95482
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][wasm] Use [UnmanagedCallersOnly] in GetDelegateForFunctionPoin… #89334
    area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95218
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.27
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95217
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 7.0.16
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95216
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.2
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Consolidate wasi/wasm build bits #95535
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • Reduce use of madvise DODUMP/DONTDUMP #95643
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • update snap authoring for June and resolve segfaults #87349
    area-Snap
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: Added `SVE_GD_2A` ARM64 encoding #95618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Migrate to the 'locker' GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #95432
    area-Meta, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A combination of dotnet build and dotnet publish --no-build -p:PublishSingleFile=true does not work in .net8.0 #37367
  • Combining `--collect` and `--no-build` breaks test datacollector discovery #37352
  • Blocks unwanted dependencies in project or solution #37349
  • dotnet -ef on MacOS intelx64 throws error #37348

Closed

  • If PublishSingleFile=true is set in the project file it changes the behavior of dotnet build and similar #29795
    9.0.1xx
  • Dotnet build does not set correct exit code when used with -graph parameter #37224

PullRequests

Created

  • Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37370
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add escape hatch for publishing with SelfContained=true, but no RuntimeIdentifier. #37368
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Permit setting whether to use workload sets or loose manifests Fixes #34561 #37346
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Fix incorrect app host used in build when PublishSingleFile=true #37114
    area-Single-File, untriaged
  • Append command line arguments to project specified RunArguments #37285
    Servicing-approved, Area-Watch, 8.0.2
  • Correct emsdk Version.Details.xml sha #37305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Ensure we deploy all Roslyn binaries into the MSBuildWorkspace BuildHosts #37340
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Don't copy MSBuild to Container outputs #37315
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move `src/Tests` to `test` #37200
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Disable Source Link's EmbedUntrackedSources in desktop WPF projects #37164
    Servicing-approved, Area-SourceLink, 8.0.2
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Open issue: relax requirement that type be enumerable to participate in collection expressions #7744

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test Plan for "Params Collections" feature #71137
  • FAR on `Create` method of a collection builder doesn't find all the usages #71133
  • [LSP] Expose on shutdown handler (similar to IOnInitialized) #71124
  • IDE0290 refactoring could leave `pragma`s after field removal #71119
  • NullReferenceException at Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.VisualBasicDataFlowAnalysis.get_ReadInside() #71115
  • [LSP] Untangle retrieving the document identifier from the executing handler #71114

Closed

  • IDE0290 refactoring results in nullability error CS8601 #71117
  • IDE0083 code fix on nullable value types results in code that does not compile afterwards #70964
    Backlog
  • CSharpUsePrimaryConstructorCodeFixProvider threw an exception #70898
    17.9
  • IDE0300 false-positive #70816
  • Roslyn unable to evaluate local variables on Windows Forms on file with Unicode characters #70580
  • InlineArray fails at runtime when declared as a ref struct. #71058
    17.9
  • IDE0290 refactoring doesn't handle inherited nested types #71120
  • IDE0301 reported for expression code #71121
  • Diagnostic Analyzers are not updated on Solution.WithAnalyzerReferences() #48216
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add "Params Collections" feature to Language Feature Status.md #71138
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make trivial Params Collections scenarios working end to end #71136
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow collection expressions with `CreateCompilation` #71134
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Cherry-pick the LINQ expression fix #71132
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use primary constructor pragmas #71131
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix LSIF generator's indexing of Razor projects #71128
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove TS impl of goto-def. The are entirely on LSP now #71123
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #71113
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Switch to file-scoped-namespaces and primary constructors for mef types in Features layer. #71129
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not throw exceptions when validating numbers in json.net parsing mode #71122
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not offer to remove fields when converting to a primary constructor if nullability annotations do not match #71126
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'use pattern matching' with nullable types #71130
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add IVT from EA.Razor to MS.ANC.Razor.Test.Common.Tooling #71086
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix DevContainer File #71127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Bump msbuild logger in response to CI image upgrades #71125
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix use-collection-expr when it breaks type inference with arrays #71105
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove dead goto-def/peek/ctrl-click EA impls for TS. TS is now entirely on LSP for these experiences. #71098
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Report diagnostics for inline array types that are not valid as type arguments. #71103
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Utilize IVsAsyncFileChangeEx2 #70936
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #71112
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and… #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check Frame's VSFPROPID_IsDocDataInitialized before Getting DocData #71102
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Loosen compiler restriction which was not required by the spec #71110
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reset loop head state when local function starting state changes #71009
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Support organizing imports as part of LSP document formatting #70538
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix building executables for language server #71007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update and unskip Razor test #70855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set order of precedence for obsoletion attribute family #71043
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ProgressMessageHandler fires too often and cannot be configured #52616
  • JwtSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultInboundClaimTypeMap.Clear() no longer effective in .NET 8 #52615
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #52612
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52611
  • Identity pages cannot be reached after migrating Blazor server from 7 to 8 #52610
  • Reading an XML document from a MultipartReader only works with an intermediate StreamReader #52607
  • Make TUser nullable on IPasswordValidator.ValidateAsync #52606
  • Net7 Blazor + WebAssembly (Client + Server) + SignalR | Hot reload fail #52605
  • Out of the box .net 8 blazor project fails when navigating directly to a route that load a page with injected dependencies. #52614
  • After update from .net6 to .net8 - first time CheckPasswordAsync will cause an exception if user is loaded with AsNoTracking #52602
  • Blank page and no error when injecting undefined service in InteractiveServer #52598
  • .Net 8 Blazor Web hot reload not working #52596

Closed

  • While performing Authorization Http client call not working #34025
    Planning: WebUI
  • How are we doing in the repo? -- spot check #50850
    Discussions
  • Hot Reload not working: Cannot update because an inferred delegate type has changed. #52270
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52600
  • Browser hangs when @layout is specified in _Imports file in child folder (Blazor-WASM) #52593
  • Blazor Component Library with www styles, the stylesheets cannot be accessed asp.net app via link tag #52594
  • .NET 8 Blazor WebApp hangs when toggling between pages #52591
  • .NET 8 Blazor Interactive Auto Mode Connection Priority #52597
  • InvalidOperationException: The authentication handler registered for scheme 'bearer' is 'JwtBearerHandler' which cannot be used for SignInAsync #52151
  • Support `google.type.Decimal` in gRPC JSON transcoding #51520
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #52585

PullRequests

Created

  • redis force-reconnect; fix release failure scenario #52608
    feature-caching, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Make user in ValidateAsync nullable #52604
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • fix version typo #52601
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • signalr `DefaultDisconectTimeout` typo #52599
    area-signalr, community-contribution

Merged

  • HeaderDictionaryTypeExtensions not using Dictionary #52551
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Add HTTP Gone (410) result #52377
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52559
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet-counters doesn't work with C# UWP project #4425
  • Diagnostics v8.0.452401 Unable to insert breakpoint 1 at 00007ff9e3121930, Win32 error 0n998 #4424
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't set MAUI iOS Navigation Icon after updating to 17.8.0 Preview 7.0 #19276
  • Issue with Navigation Back Button Disappearing on Windows Platform in .NET MAUI App #19275
  • Border is not displayed when inside a Frame in .net 8 #19274
  • MAUI Picker Control fails to show items in .NET 7 on Mac Catalyst Desktop #19273
  • MAUI RadioButton CheckedState color #19272
  • VS2022 .NET 8 MAUI iOS only Shell navigation issue when more than five tab items used #19271
  • Problem in MAUI GraphicsView, DRagInteraction Stops when Pointer is not moved. #19270
  • MAUI .NET8 Windows ListView HasUnevenRows crashes #19269
  • If FlyoutHeaderBehavior="CollapseOnScroll", the display position of the HEADER moves abnormally up. #19268
  • Toggling backlight causes UI to hang #19267
  • Reduce the width of the program window and click on the Tab (ShellContent) header in FlyoutItem for an error. #19266
  • [.NET MAUI] Application Crashes on Windows when Scaling Window which Contains Nested FlexLayout #19265
  • Starting a .NET MAUI iOS app in the debugger with Essentials enabled crashes #19264
  • iOS - Label within Border with Background does not display #19259
    Backlog
  • [Android] DatePicker control minimum date issue #19256
    Backlog
  • [ci] Setup internal lab #19255
    Backlog
  • [ci] Add ci integration for net9.0 branch #19254
    Backlog
  • GradientStop with a Color Binding of RelativeSource throws a System.NullReferenceException #19253
    Backlog
  • Not able to change title bar color in MAUI UWP #19252
  • [UITEST] Add attributes on current UI tests for category and platform so we can measure coverage and filter easier #19251
    Backlog
  • [Android] Memory exception while creating bitmap in Android 6 #19250
  • Could not compile native assembly file: typemaps.armeabi-v7a.ll #19247
  • Button doesn't reset to "Normal" if scrolled quickly to the top in IOS #19246
  • [iOS] Hardware keyboard in FormSheet disturbs content sizing #19245
    Backlog
  • Using FlyoutPage with NavigationPage not working on dotnet 8 #19243

Closed

  • NavigationPage bar gets stuck and stops updating its title #17083
  • Implement or remove PreventGestureBubbling behavior inside Windows Gesture Manager #12828
    Backlog
  • Bitcode is deprecated when publishing app to appstore MAUI in 7.0.200-preview.22628.1 #12863
    Backlog
  • Use System.Net.WebUtility.HtmlDecode instead of System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode #19183
  • Can't use WebView with local files stored as MauiAssets on Windows #16646
    Under Consideration
  • App.xaml Resource "Resources/Styles/Colors.xaml" not found #19242
  • Publish as unpackage file the publish folder is missing static resource references at runtime. #19244
  • Make SetCurrent / SetImplementation calls public #19057
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [WinUI] Add workaround for Connectivity check on Win10 #19261
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, area/desktop 🖥️, partner/cat 😻
  • Clean up / Linq removal #19260
    community ✨
  • Do not use the powershell step #19258
  • [ci] Execute build.ps1 from bash on Mac to avoid STDIO streams hang #19257

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unmapped/adhoc query types should not use proxies #32537
  • Cold shoulder issue #32536
  • IMaterializationInterceptor on InitializedInstance doesn't have loaded included properties (child entities) #32535
  • Porting EF to EF Core handling migrations #32534
  • DefaultTypeMapping().HasConversion() ignores mapping hints #32533
  • Linq Code no longer working since upgrading to .Net 8.0. Same query works fine in 7.0 #32532
  • System.AggregateException error after updating .Net and nugets packages #32531
  • EFCore Contains convert openjson with type is error #32529
  • EF should probe compatibility_level (for MS SQL) and translate appropriately #32528
  • is efcore 7 ro 8 supports BulkExtensions BatchUpdateAsync in a similar way #32527
  • Add setting to make migration script creation use EXEC(string) for migrationBuilder.Sql(...) generation #32526

Closed

  • Generate expression trees in compiled models (query filters, value converters) #29924
    9.0.0
  • How do I create an optional 1:1 relationship in EF Core where neither side is dependent on the other? #32514
  • Support for mapping single property to multiple database columns #32503
  • Are ReaderExecuting and ReaderExecuted on the DbCommandInterceptor always guaranteed to be called on the same thread? #32465

PullRequests

Created

  • Move ModelBuilding tests to EFCore.Specification.Tests #32530

Updated

  • Add DbContextOptions composibility support #32518
    breaking-change
  • [release/8.0] Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32504
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Revert behavior to throw when attempting to modify an unconstrained alternate key property #32523
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • Don't consider a generated value stable just because it was explicitly set #32497
  • Make proxies thread-safe accessing a navigation once loaded #32522
